A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: An incredible film that evolves the saga past the tropes that have held it back. If you are incapable of\, as the film says\, letting the past die\, then this film is not for you. Ive been an enormous Star Wars fan all my life and I truly loved the new directions taken in this film. Anyone saying that it’s destroying the legacy of what came before clearly has a massive misunderstanding of the franchise as a whole. I firmly believe that this movie will be considered among the series’ best in the years to come\, once everyone has a chance to calm down and we’re able to examine its place in the story.
